TopicTitle: [WIP] Auto Orbiter (space, space, T to orbit)

Articles.Content:
Always wanted to fly a rocket like Woodzor into space with a perfect gravity turn, but couldn't be bothered to pilot yourself to space? Well, here is the solution for you! Flying a rocket was never this easy: Throttle up, press the space, press it again (the moment the engines cut off), immediately followed by T. You might want to aim slightly under the horizon to make sure you circularize outside the atmosphere

Download

Auto Orbiter
